send_payment_bolt11.description: Example of sending a lightning bolt11 payment with a payment request

send_payment_onchain.description: Example of sending an onchain payment

entity_name.description: Legal name for the entity requesting access

organization_id.description: Organization for the application to be used with

provider_id.description: ID from kyc provider to track progress of the customer through the providers system

est_weekly_send_volume.description: Customer’s estimated weekly send volume (Dollars or msats)

est_weekly_receive_volume.description: Customer’s estimated weekly receive volume (Dollars or msats)

est_line_of_credit.description: Customer’s estimated line of credit (Dollars or msats)

docusign_ids.description: IDs to the associated docusigns for this application

notify_email.description: Email address to notify on application status changes

amt_paid_msats.description:
A bill may be paid for more than what was requested
The real value paid is marked here

volume_fee_msats.description: Added after we actuate the line of credit over the wallet events

est_weekly_send_volume.description: estimated volumn to be in msats for currency BTC

est_weekly_receive_volume.description: estimated volumn to be in msats for currency BTC

est_line_of_credit.description: estimated line of credit to be in msats for currency BTC

required_confirmations_num.description: The number of confirmations required for the transaction to be considered complete

tx_id.description: The hex encoded bitcoin transaction id

ledger_id.description: Maps to either the hold_id or credit_id associated with this part of the payment

height_mined_at.description: The height of the block that mined the transaction

amount_sats.description: The amount of the transaction in sats

payment_request.description: Payment request cannot be an empty string

amount_msats.description:
Amount in payment_request will override this value, if no amount is specified in the payment_request this value will be required
This amount must match the payment_request amount if it has one, and it must be greater than 0

max_fee_msats.description: If no max fee is provided we default to 1% of the payment value or 1_000 msats, must be greater than 0

address.description: Address cannot be an empty string

max_fee_sats.description: If no max fee is provided we default to 1% of the payment value or 1_000 sats, must be greater than 0

description.description: Description cannot be an empty string

address.description: Address cannot be an empty string, supports a valid bip21 uri

payment_request.description: Payment request cannot be an empty string, supports a valid uri encoded lightning invoice

amount_msats.description: Amount must be greater than 0 sats for lightning payments, must be greater than 10_000_000 msats for onchain payments

max_fee_msats.description: If no max fee is provided we default to 1% of the payment value or 1_000_000 msats, must be greater than 0

description.description: Description cannot be an empty string

amount_msats.description: None will be treated as an 'any' amount invoice, '0' not allowed

description.description:
Human-readable description of the payment
Description cannot be an empty string

allOf.description:
When the payment_request has no amount (decodes to 0 or 'any') we will require that the 'amount' is passed in as an argument
When the payment_request has a specified amount the BOLT11-encoded amount is considered canonical/authoritative
and we will error that the 'amount' in this enum does not match the payment_request decoded value

oneOf.description: Will always be null for Waived collateral types

api_key.name: x-api-key
api_key.description: Environment api key used to authenticate

bearer_token.description: User JWT token used to authentication with Bearer scheme
